variable.comment: Speed when billes go to score
variable.name: SPEEDLERP2

action.name: Create object
action.param: CanvasToLayerX("UI", LayerToCanvasX("Objects", BallsBlue.X, BallsBlue.Y), LayerToCanvasY("Objects", BallsBlue.X, BallsBlue.Y))
CanvasToLayerY("UI", LayerToCanvasX("Objects", BallsBlue.X, BallsBlue.Y), LayerToCanvasY("Objects", BallsBlue.X, BallsBlue.Y))

sub-events.comment: Death when the player touch bottom game
Player grows in size considering his number of balls

variable.comment: Number of balls needed to pass in fever mode
variable.name: FEVER_LIMIT_ACTIVATION2

sub-events.comment: Check when player is in contact with GreyBalls if fever is on, so it destroys greyball or just catch them

events.comment: While textFTUE is not enabled, camera doesn't move
